_comment: Standard template for Sora Video Generation.

_comment_params.prompt_text: REQUIRED. The text description for video generation.
_comment_params.image_url: OPTIONAL. HTTP/HTTPS URL of a reference image. LOCAL FILES NOT SUPPORTED.
_comment_params.duration_seconds: OPTIONAL. Integer. Normal Mode: [10, 15]. Pro Mode: [10, 15, 25]. Default: 10.
_comment_params.director_intent: OPTIONAL. Metadata for your own reference, ignored by API.
